TABLE.NAME: workshopallocation_scheduled
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the allocation settings for the scheduled allocator

FIELD.NAME: workshopid
FIELD.COMMENT: workshop id we are part of

FIELD.NAME: submissionend
FIELD.COMMENT: What was the workshop's submissionend when this record was created or modified

FIELD.NAME: timeallocated
FIELD.COMMENT: When was the last scheduled allocation executed

FIELD.NAME: settings
FIELD.COMMENT: The pre-defined settings for the underlying random allocation to run it with

FIELD.NAME: resultstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: The resulting status of the most recent execution

FIELD.NAME: resultmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional short message describing the resulting status

FIELD.NAME: resultlog
FIELD.COMMENT: The log of the most recent execution

KEY.NAME: fkuq_workshopid
KEY.COMMENT: Max one record for each workshop
